tika-abh06t11:8_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṁ vinanato vānaṁ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh06t11:8_1: vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti ca pavuccati amataṁ asaṅkhataṁ paramaṁ sukhaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:8_2: Vuttaṁ hetaṁ ‘‘yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna’’nti.
tika-abh06t11:12_0: Etaṁ ca nibbānaṁ nāma tayidaṁ santilakkhaṇaṁ, accutirasaṁ, assāsakaraṇarasaṁ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:13_0: Etthāha – na paramatthato nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi, titthiyānaṁ attā viya,
tika-abh06t11:13_2: paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṁ hitagavesīnaṁ yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato.
tika-abh06t11:13_5: Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā ‘‘katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t11:13_7: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’’ti rāgādīnaṁ khayova dassito,
tika-abh06t11:13_8: tasmā rāgādīnaṁ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṁ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh06t11:13_12: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’’ti rāgādīnaṁ khayova vutto,
tika-abh06t11:13_13: tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṁ khayamattatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:13_14: na cetaṁ yuttaṁ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṁ khayamattatāpajjanaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:14_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṁ khayo hoti,
tika-abh06t11:14_1: so dhammo rāgādīnaṁ khayassa upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno ‘‘rāgādīnaṁ khayo nibbāna’’nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t11:14_2: ‘‘tipusaṁ jaro guḷo semho’’tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:14_7: Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṁ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi bahubhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:15_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yadi khayo nibbānaṁ bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:15_1: gotrabhuvodānamaggaphalacittānaṁ kiṁ nu ārammaṇaṁ vadesi, vada bhadramukhāti? Rāgādīnaṁ khayameva vadāmīti.
tika-abh06t11:15_2: Kiṁ pana rāgādayo gotrabhuādīnaṁ khaṇe khīyanti, udāhu khīyissanti, atha khīṇāti?
tika-abh06t11:15_6: na gotrabhucittādīnaṁ nibbānārammaṇatā sijjhatīti. Kiṁ kāraṇaṁ?
tika-abh06t11:15_7: Gotrabhukkhaṇe rāgādayo khīyissanti, tathā vodānakkhaṇe, maggakkhaṇe pana khīyanti, na khīṇā, phalakkhaṇe khīṇā.
tika-abh06t11:15_8: Evaṁ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṁ, na itare,
tika-abh06t11:15_10: Addhā so ārammaṇaṁ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati.
tika-abh06t11:15_13: Nibbānaṁ pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati,
tika-abh06t11:21_1: ‘‘Nissaraṇa’’nti hi nibbānassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Yathāha ‘‘tayo khome, bhikkhave, dhammā duppaṭivijjhā.
tika-abh06t11:21_2: Katame tayo dhammā duppaṭivijjhā? Tisso nissaraṇadhātuyo. Kāmānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ, yadidaṁ nekkhammaṁ. Rūpānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ, yadidaṁ arūpaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:21_3: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:21_5: Evaṁ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:21_6: tasmā ayuttaṁ akkhayassa nibbānassa khayadosāpajjananti, na tu khayo nibbānaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:22_2: ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhata’’nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu paramatthavasena vuttattā ‘‘atthi nibbānaṁ nāma eko dhammo’’ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:22_3: Apica parittattike ‘‘katame dhammā appamāṇā’’ti padamuddharitvā – ‘‘cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh06t11:22_4: ime dhammā appamāṇā’’ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṁ khayassa appamāṇattaṁ kathaṁ yujjati,
tika-abh06t11:22_5: tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t11:22_7: titthiyānaṁ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṁ viya ca nāvijjamānaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:23_0: Atha paññattimattaṁ nibbānanti ce, tampi ayuttaṁ. Kasmā?
tika-abh06t11:23_2: Parittārammaṇattike ca pana ‘‘katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā’’ti padamuddharitvā ‘‘cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni ,
tika-abh06t11:23_7: ‘‘Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca, catutthassa jhānassa vipāko,
tika-abh06t11:23_8: ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t11:23_11: Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na yujjati,
tika-abh06t11:23_12: tasmā maggaphalānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṁ uppādādīnamabhāvato niccaṁ, rūpasabhāvābhāvato arūpaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:23_13: papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t11:26_0: Paṇītaṁ saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, tāṇaṁ leṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:35_0: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṁ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t11:37_0: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṁ;
